Introduction

Juhyeon is a South Korean dancer and singer under Cube Entertainment. She made her official debut in June 2021 as the leader of the girl group LIGHTSUM.

As a trainee, in October 2017, Juhyeon became a contestant on the reality survival show The Unit where she represented Cube Entertainment. She was eliminated in episode 14 after ranking in 25th place. In 2018, she became a contestant on another reality survival show, KBS2's Dancing High. She was eliminated in the second episode.

Juhyeon debuted as a member of the girl group LIGHTSUM on June 10, 2021, with their first single "Vanilla".
